## Description {#details}

This class is a data container for one entry in a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineconstantpool">MachineConstantPool</a>.

It contains a pointer to the value and an offset from the start of the constant pool. An entry in a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineconstantpool">MachineConstantPool</a>

Definition at line 67 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineconstantpool-h">MachineConstantPool.h</a>.

### needsRelocation() {#a022fed9cbfe76fd6c3b2a2358f8de17c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool MachineConstantPoolEntry::needsRelocation () const">
This method classifies the entry according to whether or not it may generate a relocation entry.

This must be conservative, so if it might codegen to a relocatable entry, it should say so.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineconstantpool-h/#l00102">102</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineconstantpool-h">MachineConstantPool.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinefunction-cpp/#l01457">1457</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinefunction-cpp">MachineFunction.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
